item.title: Rolling Thunder #9 In Production
item.content_encoded: Last week we received the flawless proofs for Rolling Thunder #9, and the magazine is currently being printed up north in French Canada. It's an excellent issue and truly bursting with content. We expect to begin shipping them out in about three weeks (March 1st)—it's the fourth consecutive issue that will come out precisely on schedule, a goal we've been working hard towards achieving. As promised, subscription copies will be the first mailed out, so if you haven't yet subscribed, now is the time to do it—if you miss the first bulk subscription mailing, the next one won't be until a few weeks later. NOTE: Current subscribers should email rtsubs@crimethinc.com if they have changed their address.

wp_comment.wp_comment_content: I don't really know where to post this comment so i figured I would do it on the most recent post/ I live in buffalo, Ny and I have been searching for my fellow crimethinc sisters and brothers. I know your out there... i would just like to know if you need any more hands. I've been doing my own single celled operations which i'm fine with, But i figure the more hands the better. if anyone has any info... please let me know... thanks

Here are some things you can try:
Seek out infoshops and other radical community spaces in your area. There are several directories such as this one published by Slingshot!: http://slingshot.tao.ca/rclist.php
Many of these sites maintain profiles on social networking sites. Look through the "friends" to find people near you geographically.
Set up a local listserve or internet discussion group; then. do guerrilla advertizing for it throughout town.
